    • Method Detail

      • initGame

        public Response initGame()
        Initializes the game with random enemies (the half of maximun) and treasures (the half of maximun). After initializes, it "reevaluates the game".
        Returns:
        A response with the data of the game.

      • reevaluateGame

        public void reevaluateGame()
        Reevaluates the difficulties of the different levels in game and recalculates the minimun scores for each level up of players.

      • newPlayer

        public Player newPlayer()
        Generates a new player object with default values, asking to user for its name and nickname.
        Returns:
        generated player object.

      • registerPlayer

        public Response registerPlayer()
        Register a new player in case there is space for it.
        Returns:
        A response with the resulting operation.

      • searchPlayerByNickname

        public Response searchPlayerByNickname(java.lang.String nickname)
        Searches for a player by its nickname.
        Parameters:
        nickname - the player to look for.
        Returns:
        A response with the resulting operation. In case of the player is found, a message with the player's information and, on the other hand, it's position in the array as data.

      • totalEnemies

        public int totalEnemies()
        Calculates the total of enemies in game.
        Returns:
        total of enemies.

      • totalTreasures

        public int totalTreasures()
        Calculates the total of treasures in game.
        Returns:
        total of treasures.

      • registerEnemyAt

        public Response registerEnemyAt(Enemy enemy,
                                int atLevel)
        Registers an enemy at a selected level
        Parameters:
        enemy - the enemy to register.
        atLevel - the selected level for the enemy.
        Returns:
        A response with the resultin operation. In case of success, with a message containing the information of the level.

      • registerTreasureAt

        public Response registerTreasureAt(Treasure treasure,
                                   int atLevel)
        Registers an treasure at a selected level
        Parameters:
        treasure - the treasure to register.
        atLevel - the selected level for the treasure.
        Returns:
        A response with the resultin operation. In case of success, with a message containing the information of the level.

      • modifyScore

        public Response modifyScore(java.lang.String nickname)
        Modifies the score of a player by reading a new score via console.
        Parameters:
        nickname - nickname of the player to modify.
        Returns:
        A response with the resulting operation. In case of success, a message with player's information.

      • getNeededScore

        public Response getNeededScore(java.lang.String nickname)
        Requests for the needed score of a player in order to level up.
        Parameters:
        nickname - nickname of the player to look for.
        Returns:
        A response with the resulting operation.

      • getTreasuresOfType

        public Response getTreasuresOfType(int type)
        Looks for all the treasures of an specified type in game.
        Parameters:
        type - type of treasure to look for.
        Returns:
        A response with the resulting operation. A message with all of the treasures information. Also, the amount of treasures found, as data.

      • getEnemiesOfType

        public Response getEnemiesOfType(int type)
        Looks for all the enemies of an specified type in game.
        Parameters:
        type - type of enemy to look for.
        Returns:
        A response with the resulting operation. A message with all of the enemies information. Also, the amount of enemies found, as data.

      • searchMostRepeatedTreasure

        public Response searchMostRepeatedTreasure()
        Looks for the most repeated treasure in game.
        Returns:
        A response with the result of the operation. A message with the information of all found treasures. Also, the amount of these treasures found, as data.

      • searchHigherScoreEnemy

        public Response searchHigherScoreEnemy()
        Looks for the first enemy in game with the highest score.
        Returns:
        A response with the result of the operation. A message with the information of the enemy. Also, its score as data.

      • topPlayers

        public Response topPlayers(int quantity)
        List a part of the top players in game.
        Parameters:
        quantity - The amount of players to show.
        Returns:
        String with all of these player's information

      • countEnemyConsonants

        public Response countEnemyConsonants()
        Looks for consonants in the names ofall ofthe game enemies.
        Returns:
        A response with the result of the operation. A message about the consontants found. Also, its total as data.

      • listPlayers

        public Response listPlayers()
        List all the players in game.
        Returns:
        String with all of player's information
